#summary How to start

Please see platform dependent application installation and start here: [Install]

 # Once the application is started, it asks you to authorize its access to Hattrick.
 # Click the link in the appearing dialog.
 # Your browser should open and show a Hattrick page asking for your credentials.
 # Input them and click OK
 # Copy the appearing authorization code to the clipboard
 # Change back to HT-History
 # Paste the copied authorization code and click OK
 # HT-History asks you about a team ID: [Choose_team]
